body_html:
@mctvis @Will-Jachar CPU only packages are available now. Install them using the commands. AMD and Intel graphics cards are not supported for BLAS accelerations.

# If you installed the CUDA versions before
conda uninstall cuda80
conda uninstall cuda90

conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch

body:
@mctvis @Will-Jachar  CPU only packages are available now. Install them using the commands. AMD and Intel graphics cards are not supported for BLAS accelerations.
```Powershell
# If you installed the CUDA versions before
conda uninstall cuda80
conda uninstall cuda90

conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch
```
